short_summary: Synergy (or Equivalent) Server ISS Support and Maintenance – August 5, 2024 to July 31, 2025
description: Synergy (or Equivalent) Server ISS Support and Maintenance – August 5, 2024 to July 31, 2025    EVENT 2 is to revise and update the list of deliverables.    Bids must be submitted through the P2P portal by the date and time indicated on page 1 of the bid solicitation.
